item.title: The last adidas Originals = PHARRELL WILLIAMS collection of 2014 will be released on November 28th
item.description: The last adidas Originals and Pharrell Williams collaboration of 2014 features a playful use of polka dots. More releases are planned for 2015. The bold and cheerful polka dot motif symbolizes energy and happiness. Source: adidas Originals. The Polka Dot Pack includes Stan Smith sneakers. Launching in Southeast Asia on November 28th, the Polka Dot Pack features leather Stan Smith sneakers. This collection embodies the profound joy of love. The youthful and optimistic designs aim for a relatable and authentic feel, representing the collaboration’s core value.
